00112 inline ClusterConeFraction::ClusterConeFraction(float coneFraction, pandora::Cluster *const pCluster, unsigned int clusterIndex) :
00113     m_coneFraction(coneFraction),
00114     m_pCluster(pCluster),
00115     m_clusterIndex(clusterIndex)

00119 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00120 
00121 inline bool ClusterConeFraction::operator< (const ClusterConeFraction &rhs) const
00122 {
00123     if (this->m_coneFraction != rhs.m_coneFraction)
00124         return (this->m_coneFraction > rhs.m_coneFraction);
00125 
00126     return (this->m_pCluster->GetHadronicEnergy() > rhs.m_pCluster->GetHadronicEnergy());
00127 }
00128
